boardgame.name: Prophecy
Proroctví
boardgame.description: Prophecy (originally released as Proroctv_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;iacute;) is a Talisman-style game by Czech designer Vladim_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;iacute;r Chv_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;aacute;til. The players represent fantasy characters on a path through a land full of adventure with the goal of grabbing ancient artifacts from the claws of demons guarding the surrounding astral realms._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Instead of rolling dice to move around the game board, players in Prophecy use a variety of means of transport. The game includes an experience system and loads of skills and spells that your character can learn. A large number of monsters that you can meet and fight also await you, as do random events that will keep taxing your abilities because after you cast a spell or lose a fight, your strength or willpower declines until it is recharged by healing._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Whoever holds four of the five hidden artifacts wins the game and becomes the next king of the land._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Expanded by:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Prophecy: Dragon Realm (2003)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Prophecy: Water Realm (2006)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Too many games. Too little time. Played a few rounds and although good reviews but not likely to play again. I think I prefer the simplicity of Talisman. Fewer cards. Estimate shipping to be £4.60 to UK address.

Edition: Zman Games (2007) ZMG7018 PROPHECY A prophecy proclaims 900 years of suffering until the artifacts are found and brought back to the people. You are one of the many adventurers, traveling the world, gathering skills, gold and experience, battling creatures, building up your strength and will in order to enter the Astral Plane and bring back the artifacts of power. Contents: 1 Game board, 211 cards, 40 wooden Strength/Health cubes, 40 wooden Willpower/Magic cubes, 35 Gold tokens, 35 Experience tokens, 10 Standup figures, 5 Character cards, 5 Reference cards, 5 plastic bases, Basic Rules and Standard Rules. No. of players: 2-5 Ages: 12+ Playing time: 180 minutes

Zman Games - Prophecy Language: English Players: 2 to 5 Age: 12+ Duration: about 180 min Weight: 2.200 kg New - mint condition - unopened - still in shrink wrap. Theme: Prophecy is a Talisman-style game by the Czech game designer Vladimír Chvátil. The players represent fantasy characters on their route through the land full of adventure with a goal of grabbing ancient artefacts from the claws of demons guarding surrounding astral realms. The one holding four out of five hidden artefacts is the winner and a next king of the land. Imagine the Talisman style of moving your character around the game board, this time not by dice rolling, but by using different means of transport. The game includes a system of experience and loads of skills and spells your character can learn on a various spaces of the land. Of course, there are quite a large number of monsters that you can meet and fight and many random events that you might face. The system of combat is also interesting - after you lose the fight or you cast a spell, your strength or your willpower declines until it is recharged by some healing. See Details (more info) or below for complete selling, payment and shipping conditions.

Zman Games - Prophecy Language: English Players: 2 to 5 Age: 12+ Duration: about 180 min Weight: 2.200 kg New - mint condition - unopened - still in shrink wrap. Theme: Prophecy is a Talisman-style game by the Czech game designer Vladimír Chvátil. The players represent fantasy characters on their route through the land full of adventure with a goal of grabbing ancient artefacts from the claws of demons guarding surrounding astral realms. The one holding four out of five hidden artefacts is the winner and a next king of the land. Imagine the Talisman style of moving your character around the game board, this time not by dice rolling, but by using different means of transport. The game includes a system of experience and loads of skills and spells your character can learn on a various spaces of the land. Of course, there are quite a large number of monsters that you can meet and fight and many random events that you might face. The system of combat is also interesting - after you lose the fight or you cast a spell, your strength or your willpower declines until it is recharged by some healing. Altar Version (+ expansion if you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re interested, see below) Game is complete, has been played, taken care of, and all components are in great condition. Included are printouts with the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;quick start_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; variants, giving characters a few starting items and skills. I think this variant helps the theme, as the starting items are thematically tied to the character; and the variant speeds up the game since you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re not quite so puny and defenseless to start. The box shows wear along the corners and some edges. Three corners have been carefully taped from the inside as I feared the corners would start splitting. Bonus! For an extra $4, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll include the Dragon Realm expansion, new in shrink. This will fit inside the base game box, and not really effect shipping costs! Let me know if you have any questions/concerns, or would like a shipping estimate.

Prophecy [b]Edition:[/b] Z-man games, Third edition, 2014 [b]Language:[/b] English, language [b]Language Dependance:[/b] High, Lots of necessary in-game text [b]Condition:[/b] Excellent condition, played only a few times. [b]BUNDLE: Base game + Dragon Realm + Water Realm.[/b] 2007 Z-Man Second Edition of the Prophecy base game (which is the uncensored version with the original, oh-so-controversial bare=breasted artwork on the Succubus and Harpies cards), the Dragon Realm expansion, the Water Realm expansion, and several nice fan-made player aids. Water Realm is brand new in factory shrink. The components of Dragon Realm are essentially brand new (unpunched tokens, factory-sealed cards: see photos), but I threw away the box for Dragon Realm since the components fit in the base game box. The base game box and components are complete and in excellent condition. The rulebook has some (sensible, in my opinion) underlining in it. Includes a couple laminated copies of the fantastic UniversalHead fan-made player aids. Includes some printed out variant rules. Includes a laminated side board to hold the displayed Guild Cards (which otherwise tend to make the board a bit crowded).
Box has some shelf wear. All components are intact and in excellent condition.
